Tech Evolution

My Technology Evolution Journey

2014-2016

Web Development Foundation

My journey began in web development, where I first encountered the challenges of handling user data and realized the untapped potential in the information flowing through applications.

HTML/CSS JavaScript PHP MySQL
2016-2018

Data Analytics Discovery

Entered the data field by learning SAS Statistical Analytics System. Mastered Base SAS, PROC SQL, and business intelligence fundamentals. Started mining hidden gems from data.

SAS PROC SQL Business Intelligence Statistical Analysis
2018-2020

Data Engineering & Science

Evolved to Python and R ecosystems. Built data pipelines with Spark and cloud platforms. Developed machine learning models and statistical analysis across multiple domains.

Python R Spark PySpark Scikit-learn Pandas
2020-2022

Cloud Data Engineering

Mastered cloud platforms and modern data stack. Built enterprise data pipelines using AWS, Azure, and GCP. Specialized in data orchestration and warehouse optimization.

AWS Azure GCP Airflow dbt Snowflake
2022-2023

ML Engineering & MLOps

Advanced into machine learning engineering and MLOps. Deployed production ML models, built real-time inference systems, and automated model lifecycle management.

TensorFlow PyTorch MLflow Kubeflow Docker Kubernetes
2023-Present

AI Systems & Automation

Leading the evolution to intelligent automation with LangChain, CrewAI, and multi-agent systems. Building production-ready AI solutions that integrate with existing data infrastructure.

LangChain CrewAI ChromaDB Multi-Agent Systems FastAPI React

My Approach

ðŸ”„

Evolution Over Revolution

I believe in gradual, sustainable technology adoption. My 10+ year journey from SAS to AI shows how to evolve existing systems rather than replacing everything at once.

ðŸŽ¯

Business-First Thinking

Technology should solve real business problems. I focus on measurable outcomes: faster processing, cost savings, and improved accuracy rather than just using the latest tools.

ðŸ”§

Practical Implementation

I build systems that work in production. My experience across multiple domains helps me anticipate real-world challenges and design robust, scalable solutions.
